Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the development of the movie 'Finding Nemo' released in 2003?
Options:
A. Andrew Stanton wrote and directed 'Finding Nemo'.
B. Finding Nemo was developed by Pixar Animation Studios.
C. The movie was released in 2005.
D. Andrew Stanton was not involved in the film's development.
Correct Answer: Andrew Stanton wrote and directed 'Finding Nemo'., Finding Nemo was developed by Pixar Animation Studios.
